resources.string: Error in timer value! It will be set to 60 sec.
You can not remove all of the exercises
Select an exercise from the list
Please click BACK again to exit
Please, select the measure of weight
The main objective of this application - replace the paper training diary at something more useful and smart \ n

They can be used just like ordinary paper diary and training. \nStart training (eg training of the legs) , turn on the app , choose standard training legs, or you have created a training program on its feet. \nIf you are just starting to engage with the program , the weights and reps will be on the unit. But if you exercise more than one exercise for each training program the application starts prompt and put a value from a previous workout. For example, squats . You train a second week with this application , run it in training, and what you see ? You see that last workout you " sat down " with a weight of 100kg 15 times (for example) . But you know that for muscle growth , the need for progress loads so now you have to do 100kg 17 times in the first approach (for example) . And so on all the training .

Continued progress in the power load - most effective way to build muscle mass. \nMuscles quickly become accustomed to a constant load , you can see for yourself how people in gyms for years trained with the same weights and stand still in progress. \nPeople involved so years. Reach any result and then trampled on it for years. Over time, the habit is fixed , and people are not even aware , and not particularly committed to progress. However, if you run a training diary for you all the way. Sense and the basic idea of ​​the diary - to seek progress load , which leads to an increase in strength and muscle . Remember, if there is nothing around you does not change ( weight on the equipment ), you ( your muscles ) is also no reason to change ( grow and become stronger) .

Very often lazy adherents say the following: " Haha I keep a diary ? I have a good memory and I can remember without notes . " Mon ami , without notes - you\'re a bug , both literally and figuratively, if we are talking about bodybuilding . First, without a diary , you will remember , at best, a maximum weight of one working approach ( 105 kg . Shrugged 6 - five times , and how much shrugged and rested in the following - it is not clear ) . Second came the next workout you will likely deliver those same 105 kg and pozhmesh their 6 - five times , ie without progression, because you will not have a clear idea when and how to load progress .

Because when you train properly with the diary , you are in a state of constant struggle for progress . Each workout is filled with your clear meaning . Before each exercise approach you look at the number of repetitions and the weight that you overcame it last training session and try to go beyond this . You have a very clear objective - to add in one of the working approaches more reps or weight work , without loss results in other approaches and working exercises. \nGain can be microscopic . For example, if you shook last workout 105 kg 7 -NIL times , try to shake 106 kg 7 -NIL or 105 -Th 8 -NIL or 105 -Th 7 -NIL and a half ( let them help partner doge half ) . BUT these increases should be. You should strive to make them ALWAYS ! And even if you exercise this month easily (within periodization ) , you will always remember that this is only for one purpose - to make further gain . You may find that 1 kg bench press - it is very small , but count how many you add a year at the rate of growth - the scales at 4 kg per month. It\'s a crazy figure - 48 kg ! And I assure you, if you\'ll reap technically lying 150 kg ( the right muscles ), the size of your shoulder girdle sooooo MUCH grows compared to the old 105 kg . And besides themselves give meaning to your workout . It is this nuance , by the way , features sports and physical culture , friends. Fighting for the best result - is a sport ! Everything else - this exercise . \nProgress can load your muscles mass of different ways. You can , for example, reduce the rest between sets , increase the number of approaches themselves , change the forum of the exercise , change the speed of the movement , many of the principles used to increase the intensity . However, in this sense, I agree with Mr. Murphy, who said that the more complex and graceful plan , the greater the chance that it will fail . All these complex ways to increase the intensity only confuse the novice and will bring more chaos in his head than use his muscles. So remember , your task progressed weight training weights ! That is the problem you will solve handily thanks training diary .
OK, I\'m doing on my diary but power rates are falling! = (

Sometimes it happens . And well , you saw it in its statistics . Now you need to give your body more time to recover . 
In this case, there are two ways , and it is better to use both of them ( at a set weight) . 
1 - Increase the time between workouts of the same group. Especially the large muscle groups . ( For example train each group more than once in 7 days, and every 10 days . Your muscles will have more time to recover , and they will be compensated in excess of the resources spent , thereby grow.) 
2 - Increase the caloric intake and the amount of protein in the diet. Add 300-500 calories to your diet , and look at the statistics in 2-3 weeks , your power rates should go up!

Whichever classroom genetics you did not have , as it were scrupulously from workout to workout did not try to increase your weight working on the equipment . In any case, at some point there will be " stop " when a further increase in the linear weights are obtained cease . There are two solutions . 
1 - Do not change ( try to continue to increase linearly weight) 
2 - Reduce weight ( step step back ) , then to add more ( to move forward ) 
The first method in the presence of the diary will also work . Only the growth rate very slow . But it is better to go slowly than all the years to stand without moving. Right? But the second way , when you reduce the load , and then rested a certain amount of training, take more weight than originally (not linear progress ) has proven effective in all sports . Actually , this method is called pereodizatsiey . When you move forward, not in a straight line , and using an undulating effect. Reminds me that great of a sail forward - perpendicular to the wind using a different tack (movement different tacks ) . During light load (moving in the wind ), you dial the desired inertia ( speed) to progress with a heavy load ( motion perpendicular to the wind ) . And set the desired inertia (speed) takes longer than the actual forward movement . In general, you do two steps back (or on the side, so if you prefer ) , in order to then take a step or half-step forward. 
So , my friends, to work correctly under pereodizatsii training diary you vital. Because in it you will very clearly see and know how to train for each specific training. Usually in training diary signs plan " active rest " with a gradual ( from workout to workout ) buildup loads to marginal . Such a vast array of numbers and accurate data on all approaches , repetitions and exercises to remember is simply not possible and therefore necessary diary (plan ) for their illustrations .
Analysis based on a training diary

In addition to the progression of loads, a training diary gives you the unique opportunity for analysis. With it, you can improve his / her training programme depending on what works and what doesn\'t. \nIt so happens that you are in a state of stagnation. To get out of it you need to know how. For this, the first thing you do is take your training diary and see that you have worked effectively, and what is not. Look for the cause of stagnation or causes of «breakthroughs». For example, did you notice, now, the progress in the bench press is much slower than it was 5 months ago. Previously, you could easily add 2 kg every practice, but now even 1 kg for you is hard. See, then, that the training was different, and you see then after pressing you did three approaches on the uneven bars. It is quite possible that the effectiveness of the previous program was better because of this nuance. Try and see. Or another situation, you need to return to pull rod in the slope of you 3 months not made replaced the cravings dumbbell in one hand). What weight you took in traction rods in all operational approaches you tell a training diary, as well as that if you stronger or not. In General, diary helps you construct a more appropriate personal program with high efficiency. \nIt is quite possible that you will make mistakes (choose not effective exercises or make them not effective volume/form), that is quite acceptable. The main thing that you saw these errors and correct them. This can often only through in-depth analysis of the training diary. YOU try something out and see the result. If the decision was a mistake, again going to change something. Ultimately, you always go forward, even if you did something wrong.
Tip: do not change often training program

Otherwise you will have little «reference points» for analysis and you never know what really works and what doesn\'t. \nAnother very important advantage of the training diary is to improve your motivation. At some point you can begin to eat doubt: am I doing everything right? Why slowed growth? I\'m not sure that I can achieve such results as professionals...etc. to Struggle with doubts will also help the training diary: you just flip through it for the last year and see how changing your achievements . You see that are not standing still and that there is progress. It calms you and returns your psyche on the «usual rails».
Why do i need this app?
There is an error in app "Workout Diary".\nCrash report will be send by email.
Please, leave your 5 star feedback on Google Play Market
Auto backup to Google Drive at the end of training
You had just backuped all your data to Google Drive\nYou can find it at: "GoogleDrive/Workout Diary Backups/"
Error!\nYou can`t restore database during training!
Error editing exercise!\nYou can`t delete exercise during training
Error deleting exercise!\nYou can`t delete exercise during training
There is no history for this training:
Are you sure you want to restore all the data from SD card? It will delete all your data
Check exercises for a training program:
Do not turn off the screen during a workout?
display the data from the last workout
